snippet.title: Zombie Defense Squad XBLIG Gameplay
snippet.description:
Zombie Defense Squad XBLIG Gameplay

Game Description: Join the Zombie Defense Squad and help protect the town from the zombie menace. Earn cash by eradicating zombies and use this cash to purchase new weapons and ammo. You can play offline or choose to go online and play co-op with three other people in this fast paced zombie shooter.

Created by: Strange Games

Price: $1.00

Download link: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Zombie-Defense-Squad/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d80258550dff

Make sure you Like, Comment and Subscribe!
